snippet: The levying of fines over Russia’s refusal to turn over the Schneerson Collection added tension to Russian-American relations, which have become strained over the past year.

byline.contributor: Andrew Roth contributed reporting from Moscow, and Carol Vogel from New York.

lead_paragraph: The levying of fines over Russia’s refusal to turn over the Schneerson Collection added tension to Russian-American relations, which have become strained over the past year.

headline.seo: Russia Warns of Retaliation Over U.S. Ruling on Schneerson Collection
headline.main: Russia Warns of Retaliation Over U.S. Ruling on a Jewish Collection
headline.print_headline: Russia Warns of Retaliation Over U.S. Ruling on a Jewish Collection
